name: spex
author: Jens von Pilgrim <developer@jevopi.de>
description: Extensible markdown for specifications written in N4JS/JavaScript

scripts.test: n4js-mangelhaft --scan . --compile --targetPlatformFile targetplatform.n4tp --targetPlatformInstallLocation build/npm --xunitReportFile build/spex-test-report.xml --xunitReportName spex-test-report --xunitReportPackage spex.tests
